QuestData.Title: The Emerging Threat
QuestData.Description: I am all that remains of my company, sent to monitor the many changes on this coast of Desolace.$b$bI have reported of the dramatic increase of naga here, but to no effect.$b$bMy peers are focused on other crises, so I must ask you, a stranger, to assist me in my research.$b$bFirst, though, allow me to show you the threat we face.
QuestData.LogDescription: Korrah wants you to speak to her when you are ready to be shown the Naga threat.
QuestData.CompletionText: Now you see, $r. This is not a matter to be taken lightly.
QuestData.RewardText: So now you see. These are not a simple band of displaced naga, but a well organized army, capable of great devastation.$b$bDo you agree to assist me in my investigation?
